content: शेखरः {@--1@} A crest, chaplet, tuft, a garland of flowers worn on the head; कपालि वा स्यादथर्वेदुशेखरं <ls>Ku. 5. 78</ls>, <ls n="Ku.">7. 42</ls>; नवकरनिकरेण स्पष्टबधूक सूनस्तब करचितमेते शेखरं बिभ्रतीव <ls>Śi. 11. 46</ls>, <ls n="Śi. 11.">4</ls>, <ls n="Śi. 11.">50</ls>; मग धदेशशेखरीभूता पुष्पपुरी नाम नगरी <ls>Dk.</ls> {@--2@} A diadem, crown. {@--3@} A peak, summit. {@--4@} The best or most distinguished of a class (at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>). {@--5@} A kind of {%Dhruva%} or burden of a song. --रं Cloves.
